title: Predicting the phytotoxic mechanism of action of LiCoO2 nanomaterials using a novel multiplexed algal cytological imaging (MACI) assay and machine learning
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,507-517
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00629H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eric Ostovich, Austin Henke, Curtis Green, Robert Hamers, Rebecca Klaper
This work uses novel high-throughput phenotypic profiling techniques to elucidate the most probable phytotoxic mechanism of action of LiCoO2 nanosheets.
